page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up at 7:30 on week days I get dressed, pack my school bag(lunch box, homework), have breakfast, I have a cooked breakfast or cornflakes every morning. By that time it is about 8:30, I go and get washed, get my shoes on, wait for my mum to finish doing her hair, then we go to school. School starts at 9:00. During school time we have assembly, first break, lunch break, and hometime. After school ends at 3:15 I go home,put my play trousers on and go outside to play. At 4:10 I come back inside to watch television until 6:00. At 6:00 my dad comes home from working on the farm. After tea I either go outside to play or watch television. Between 8:30 and 9:00 I go to bed but if I am watching a good film I'm allowed to stay up a bit later.
